DOC.detailed_description: This study 12-week , double-blind , placebo-controlled trial test efficacy topiramate versus placebo aid smoking cessation recover alcohol dependent men . Another aim study explore whether topiramate reduces relapse alcohol use patient comorbid alcohol nicotine dependence . All participant receive standardize psychosocial intervention combination medication ( placebo ) . Following completion treatment phase study , participant enter 24-week follow-up period longer-term outcome intervention assess .
